page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our area includes Collier St. and Queens St. They are divided by the R.Teise and there is no direct road link across. The population is 572 but by the year 2000 it may be 600. The area has services like the postman who comes everyday and the dustman and library. Both of these come every week. There is only 1 general store including a post office.There is a fete in the area every year.This year it was in aid of the church which was badly burned in January.Land use has changed as there are less fruit trees and hops and more cereal crops. Also employment and housing has changed. Fewer people are employed on the farms now and people from outside are coming to buy and modernise old properties e.g. oast houses and farmworkers cottages. People commute to London or Maidstone to work.
